Eric Schmidt said on his blogpost that Page, the son of a Michigan State University computer science professor, will now lead product development and technology strategy, areas that are`` his greatest strengths.'' It will be interesting to see what he'll do that's different, what he could not have done in his prior role, said BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis. for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role-- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said Peter Schiff Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page.

It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas`` keys'' are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.
